order.description: The order in which species should be sorted. Based on National Dex order, except families are grouped together and sorted by stage.

gender_rate.description: The chance of this Pokémon being female, in eighths; or -1 for genderless.

capture_rate.description: The base capture rate; up to 255. The higher the number, the easier the catch.

base_happiness.description: The happiness when caught by a normal Pokéball; up to 255. The higher the number, the happier the Pokémon.

is_baby.description: Whether or not this is a baby Pokémon.

is_legendary.description: Whether or not this is a legendary Pokémon.

is_mythical.description: Whether or not this is a mythical Pokémon.

hatch_counter.description: Initial hatch counter: one must walk 255 × (hatch_counter + 1) steps before this Pokémon's egg hatches, unless utilizing bonuses like Flame Body's.

has_gender_differences.description: Whether or not this Pokémon has visual gender differences.

forms_switchable.description: Whether or not this Pokémon has multiple forms and can switch between them.

growth_rate.description: The rate at which this Pokémon species gains levels.

pokedex_numbers.description: A list of Pokedexes and the indexes reserved within them for this Pokémon species.

egg_groups.description: A list of egg groups this Pokémon species is a member of.

color.description: The color of this Pokémon for Pokédex search.

shape.description: The shape of this Pokémon for Pokédex search.

evolves_from_species.description: The Pokémon species that evolves into this Pokemon_species.

evolution_chain.description: The evolution chain this Pokémon species is a member of.

habitat.description: The habitat this Pokémon species can be encountered in.

generation.description: The generation this Pokémon species was introduced in.

pal_park_encounters.description: A list of encounters that can be had with this Pokémon species in pal park.

flavor_text_entries.description: A list of flavor text entries for this Pokémon species.

form_descriptions.description: Descriptions of different forms Pokémon take on within the Pokémon species.

genera.description: The genus of this Pokémon species listed in multiple languages.

varieties.description: A list of the Pokémon that exist within this Pokémon species.
